item.title: Hp bar
item.dc:creator: @strucker Strucker
item.description:
@strucker wrote:

Base delta

Im messing with something whatever, how do i make the hp bar appear, and the damage dealed?
here is my deal damage method

public void dealDamage(int amt) { ((Client) this).sM("Dealing " + amt + " damage to you (hp=" + currentHealth + ")"); currentHealth -= amt; if (currentHealth <= 0) { ((Client) this).sM("Triggering death timer"); currentHealth = 0; updateRequired = true; hitUpdateRequired = true; deathStage = 1; // hitDiff=1; deathTimer = System.currentTimeMillis(); } else { /* * if(amt == 0){ if (playerEquipment[playerShield] == -1){ pEmote = * 404; } else { pEmote = 403; } } */ } }
